column4: That did not help. I am looking how to create an interface that accidentally got remove
have you looked at any of the laptop pages for your model, or close to your model?

I somehow removed an interface. I want to get it back. Nothing more, nothing less. The rest I can do on my own. Why do you think looking at a laptop guide would help me with the generic problem of creating an interface that was removed?
just look at the page and see if it's there - maybe the problem's been solved already or maybe there's simply no solution at all.
